INVALID_FILE_HEADER: Uh oh, this file format is not supported.
INVALID_FILE_TEXT: Please upload a valid file. Supported formats include PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and videos.
FILE_LIMIT_HEADER: Uh oh, this file exceeds the size limit.
FILE_LIMIT_TEXT: The max file size is 15 MB. Upload a valid file within the size limit
TOO_MANY_ATTACHMENTS_TEXT: You can only upload up to {{max}} files at a time.
